title: Jörmungandr

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Swallow someone each night. Their role and will will appear as "Devoured".

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you swallow a Fallen Angel, you will have roleblock, redirection, conversion, and detection immunity while doing so, as well as total death immunity except for against other Fallen Angels, and other negative effects against you will be negated.
- If you judge a non-Fallen Angel, you will learn their role and be able to read their will.
**Sin of Gluttony** — If you're the last Fallen Angel remaining, you can choose a faction each night instead. You will swallow every member of that faction after (4 - X) days, where X is the number of dead Fallen Angels, and the Town will be informed that you are doing so.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to crush all who would oppose the Fallen Angels.

desc:
Post 616
*The world serpant prophesised to consume all existence, its hunger is fiercer than the blazing night and vaster than the infinite depths.*
